contentList.content: Strike with your weapon wreathed in golden light, illuminating your target and preventing it from turning <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag> for [1] turns.
You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">melee weapon attacks</LSTag> against Lightly or Heavily Obscured targets when wielding this blade.

The wielder of this weapon is always Proficient with it, Attack and damage rolls made with this weapon use the wielder's Spellcasting Ability Modifier and if thrown the weapon returns to the wielder.

The wielder has Advantage on Attack Rolls against Lightly or Heavily Obscured targets.

Weave a shadowy shortsword in your hand that deals [1], returns to the wielder when thrown and uses the wielder's <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Spellcasting Ability Modifier</LSTag> for <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag> and damage rolls.
When you use the sword to attack a target that is in dim light or darkness, you make the <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.

The blade deals [1] and uses your <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Spellcasting Modifier</LSTag> for <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag> and damage rolls. It also sheds bright light in a [2] radius and dim light in a [3] radius.

Weave a fiery scimitar in your hand that deals [1], returns to the wielder when thrown and uses the wielder's <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Spellcasting Ability Modifier</LSTag> for <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag> and damage rolls. It also sheds bright light in a [2] radius and dim light in a [3] radius.
